creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: sea horse in L profile; green and aquamarine background; small blue and white bubble ULC; separate paper with New Year greeting stamped in red
marks:
Signature, Inscription, and Seals

b, in pen: [Y a, in pencil, bottom margin: [Yoshida]
medium: Woodblock print; ink and colors on paper
title: Greeting Cards to H.E. Robison
